Class itml.simulator.StateBattle

java.lang.Object
  itml.simulator.StateBattle

public class itml.simulator.StateBattle
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements the type itml.simulator.StateBattle, which keeps track of the current state of a battle. (i.e., size of arena and information about the two competing agents and their last actions).

public itml.simulator.StateBattle(int numColumns,
                   int numRows,
                   int numSteps,
                   itml.simulator.StateAgent[] stateAgents)
Constructor, create a new battle state.

Parameters:
numColumns - An integer representing the number of column of the arena.
numRows - An integer representing the number of rows of the arena.
numSteps - An integer representing the maximum number of steps (turns) a battle can take.
stateAgents - An itml.simulator.StateAgent array with information about competing agents.
